This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Removed plan-specific restrictions (Pro/Pro+) for selecting Copilot Coding Agent AI models.
- Generalized model selection availability to supported entrypoints (issue assignment, agents tab/panel, GitHub Mobile, Raycast).
- Added fallback to Auto model when picker isn't available.
- Removed outdated notes about upcoming support for Business/Enterprise plans.

### Title
Generalize Copilot Coding Agent model selection across plans and entrypoints
